whatToExpect: Share your pet’s care needs on Homezy and choose from verified sitters nearby. You’ll be able to review profiles, ratings, and services offered before confirming your booking.

faqs.question: Can I book overnight stays at the sitter’s home?
faqs.answer: Yes, many sitters offer both in-home and hosted overnight care options. Check their profile to see what’s available.

faqs.question: Will my pet be left alone overnight?
faqs.answer: No, overnight sitters stay with your pet to ensure continuous care and companionship throughout the night.
